definition: operating with minimal human intervention, a pistol that will keep firing until the ammunition is gone or the trigger is released
details:
adjective
- operating with minimal human intervention
- resembling the unthinking functioning of a machine
= example: resembling the unthinking functioning of a machine
= synonyms: automatonlike, machinelike, robotlike, robotic
- without volition or conscious control
= example: without volition or conscious control
= synonyms: reflexive, reflex
noun
- a pistol that will keep firing until the ammunition is gone or the trigger is released
= synonyms: automatic pistol
- light machine gun
= synonyms: automatic rifle, machine rifle
